title: Introducing: STACEY
body:
Singer/Songwriter, STACEY, from Toronto translates the cold of Canada into an icy piano ballad titled “Worst Part.

” Harmonizing with herself over undulating piano melodies, Stacey sings “you leave me wanting more” and “I need you.” Producer Alex Bonenfant uses the same lo-fi, slightly distorted, vocals heard in his other projects including Metz and Crystal Castles. It’s a breathy ballad that truly leaves you _wanting more_ and coincidentally thats the _worst part_.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/106927871″ width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
